title._content: American doctors for Germany -- and nurses  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. American doctors for Germany -- and nurses [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: On negative: Dr. Jos. King, Dr. Louis Brooks, Dr. H. Fischer, Dr. J.L. Matheshemer, Emma Hoffman, L. Lorenz, A. Jansen, E. Duensing. Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19895 Call Number: LC-B2- 3597-8
